title: Panel, 1932
medium:
Medium: cotton; ink or gouache
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave
dimensions: H x W (selvedge to selvedge): 81 x 153.7 cm (31 7/8 x 60 1/2 in.)
description: Hanging depicts a battle between forces of good and evil in landscape. Figures armed with spears or bows are pictured among trees and mounds of land with foliage. Black and greys on white cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 1932.Medium: cotton; ink or gouache
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave. 1974-9-3.
